PageFilter - Class in Application.Filter
Implementation of the Filter interface that checks that the navigations paths of the application are respected.

pageSelect - Variable in class Application.Utils.UnsplashConnector
Page number query-string parameter for Unsplash API.
PaletteManagement - Class in Application.Utils
Utility class used to manage the colors assigned to each emotion and to manage the combination of Feeling.
This is reflected in a User profile page.
PaletteManagement() - Constructor for class Application.Utils.PaletteManagement
 
password - Variable in class Application.Domain.Credentials
The password of the User.
PictureCreationException - Exception in Application.Exception
Exception thrown by ImageProcessor, VisionController and VisionManagementController when trying to create an image.
PictureCreationException() - Constructor for exception Application.Exception.PictureCreationException
 
PictureUploadException - Exception in Application.Exception
Exception thrown by ProfileController and ScenarioManagementController when trying to upload an image for a User's profile or for a Scenario.

player - Variable in class Application.Domain.Match
The User who played the Match.
points - Variable in class Application.Domain.Leaderboard
The sum of all the points achieved by the User as recorded in the Match object.
points - Variable in class Application.Domain.Match
The points earned by the User by guessing the Dimensions.
positionX - Variable in class Application.Domain.VisionQueryWord
The horizontal clipping position of the picture.
positionY - Variable in class Application.Domain.VisionQueryWord
The vertical clipping position of the picture.

Height of the photo collage.
